intent_analysis:
Intent: Turn off all non-essential devices, including three meross Light Strips and two Samsung TVs, while keeping the refrigerator on.  
Signals: Command from Abhisek to turn off non-essential devices; identified devices capable of switching off; refrigerator considered essential.  
Risk: None; all devices identified for action are confirmed as non-essential based on the command.
environment_overview:
**Detected Devices with Inferred Locations/Capabilities:**  
The following devices have been identified for action based on the user command: a c2c-switch, three meross Light Strips, two Samsung TVs, a Samsung refrigerator, a Samsung dishwasher, and an additional meross Light Strip. The c2c-switch is capable of switching on and off, while the meross Light Strips can control color, brightness, and switching. The Samsung TVs and dishwasher are also equipped with switching capabilities, indicating they can be turned off remotely.

**Current States and Actionable Controls:**  
The c2c-switch is currently off and ready for action. The first meross Light Strip is set to a brightness level of 70, while the second is at 48. Both Samsung TVs are identified as non-essential and can be turned off. The refrigerator remains on, as it is considered essential. The dishwasher is also available for switching off. If any device does not respond to the off command, a refresh command will be issued to ensure readiness for further actions.
